text: int * * make2darray ( int ) ; int choose ( int * * , int , int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int y ; scanf ( "%d" , & y ) ; while ( y -- ) { int t , j , i , * * a ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; a = make2darray ( t ) ; int sum = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; j = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t - 1 ; ) { j = choose ( a , i , j , t ) ; i ++ ; sum += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } } int * * make2darray ( int rows ) { int * * x , i , cols ; x = malloc ( rows * sizeof ( * x ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { cols = i + 1 ; x [ i ] = malloc ( cols * sizeof ( * * x ) ) ; int j ; for ( j = 0 ; j < cols ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } return x ; } int choose ( int * * x , int i , int j , int t ) { int a = 0 , b = 0 , w , e ; int k = j ; for ( w = i + 1 ; w < t ; w ++ ) { a += x [ w ] [ j ] ; } for ( w = i + 1 ; w < t ; w ++ ) { k ++ ; b += x [ w ] [ k ] ; } int g = ( a > b ) ? j : j + 1 ; return g ; }

int * * make2darray ( int rows ) { int * * x , i , cols ; x = malloc ( rows * sizeof ( * x ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { cols = i + 1 ; x [ i ] = malloc ( cols * sizeof ( * * x ) ) ; int j ; for ( j = 0 ; j < cols ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } return x ; }

int choose ( int * * x , int i , int j , int t ) { int a = 0 , b = 0 , w , e ; int k = j ; for ( w = i + 1 ; w < t ; w ++ ) { a += x [ w ] [ j ] ; } for ( w = i + 1 ; w < t ; w ++ ) { k ++ ; b += x [ w ] [ k ] ; } int g = ( a > b ) ? j : j + 1 ; return g ; }
